channel.title: CVE Feed for Sandsprite -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sandsprite -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-0581|2024-08-01T18:11:35.426Z -- sandsprite -- scdbg
item.description: An Uncontrolled Resource Consumption vulnerability has been found on Sandsprite Scdbg.exe, affecting version 1.0. This vulnerability allows an attacker to send a specially crafted shellcode payload to the '/foff' parameter and cause an application shutdown. A malware program could use this shellcode sequence to shut down the application and evade the scan.
